topics.title: Overview
topics.content:
## Standup

AI-generated daily standup summaries from your git activity. Crawls local commits, branches, and merged PRs from the active project to produce concise daily reports.

Click **Generate** to create today's standup. If you missed days, it automatically backfills up to N days (configurable).

topics.title: Key Features
topics.content:
## Key Features

**Git-Powered** — Gathers real commit history, branch activity, and merged PRs from the active project.

**Backfill** — Missed a few days? Click Generate and it fills in missing dates automatically (configurable lookback).

**History** — Browse past standups in the sidebar. Click any date to view its report.

**Configurable** — Choose orchestrator, model, free agent mode, and customize the prompt in Settings.

topics.title: Commands
topics.content:
## Commands

| Command | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| **Generate Standup** | Creates standups for today and any missing recent days |

topics.title: Permissions
topics.content:
## Permissions

| Permission | Why it's needed |
|------------|----------------|
| **logging** | Log diagnostic information |
| **storage** | Persist standup history globally |
| **notifications** | Show completion and error notifications |
| **agents** | Spawn a quick agent to generate summaries |
| **projects** | Access the active project for git data |
| **commands** | Register the Generate Standup command |
| **theme** | Adapt to the user's color theme |
| **settings** | Read user configuration |
| **process** | Execute git and gh CLI commands |
